/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings rise in the distance, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
